item.description:
The Brettl-Hupfers will be up at our lodge in Bartlett NH for the long weekend. There’ll be plenty of good skiing and snowboarding. We’re about 2 miles from Attitash and close to Bretton Woods, Wildcat, Cranmore and Black Mountain.

There’s also hiking, snowshoeing and outlet shopping in valley. On Saturday and Sunday, there will be several Apres Ski events held at nearby ski clubs. One of them is a Dating Game themed party, which is usually a fun time.

So come up and join us for Friday and Saturday or stay till Monday if you have a long weekend. Guests are welcome for $20 per night guest fees. Once you RSVP full directions and information will follow.

Members and guests must be 21+
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be at the club, come on in and say hello
item.name: Presidents Day Weekend at the Bretts
